content: The Bonus Program Is Closed Unfortunately!You Can Only Buy The Tokens And The Minimum Investment Is $300Time Limited Offer! The DeadLine - 15 Nov 2022Smartex New Crypto Exchange Announces A Promo Action!You Can Invest $100 And Make $595 With STX Token In 2-3 Weeks!1. You Sign Up With Smartex Crypto Exchange And Get 100 STX Tokens2. You Invest $100 To Buy At $0.4 (Pre-Sale) 250 More STX Tokens 3. You Pass An ID Verification And Get 500 More STX Tokens So In Total You Get 850 STX Tokens, That Can Be Sold Min. At $0.7-$0.8 ($595-$680) If You Are Interested In My Offer, So Follow The Instructions: 1. Sign Up here > https://smartex.network/register?ref=KHWNXC (with the real name and email)2. You Will Get An Email > click the link inside to activate the registration.3. Go to your profile https://smartex.network/edit-profile and fill in your Telegram @user field (without it you will not get 100 tokens - $40 worth currently). Example https://ibb.co/xXVMcj04. In your profile click https://smartex.network/profile-verify to pass the verification (ID or passport) (without it you will not get 500 tokens - $200 worth currently). 5. Buy Here https://smartex.network/pre-sale.html you should buy $100 worth 250 STX Tokens(the best option is to send BUSD to specified address or contact support)6. Join the Telegram channel https://t.me/Smartex_Info or just type @Smartex_Info (obligatory to get above ementioned free 100 tokens). 7. And join our Telegram group https://t.me/exchangesmartex or @exchangesmartexThat`s All You need To Do.Thank You In AdvanceP.S.Please post below your: User ID and Telegram @username[/b][/color]

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I saw in the telegram announcement that to enjoy the bonus you have to make a minimum deposit of $100, is this deposit to unlock all the bonuses you get as you say?because it's quite unreasonable with that much profit with just such an easy task

comments.author: tbaroyan
comments.body: Hi,Yes, you buy $100 worth 250 STX tokens  - to unlock all your 600 free bonus tokens and to be able to sell/trade them and withdraw.It was previously considered something like airdrop, but the Team decided to filter out non-serious people, that come to get the bonuses in order to sell them and dump the token`s price.In Total you get 250 + 100 + 500 = 850 TokensPlus The Team is issuing Smartex Exchange SUSD stable coin and you will also get Amount of Purchased Tokens X 0,1 SUSD on your balance.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: tbaroyan on November 04, 2022, 03:45:46 PMHi,Yes, you buy $100 worth 250 STX tokens  - to unlock all your 600 free bonus tokens and to be able to sell/trade them and withdraw.It was previously considered something like airdrop, but the Team decided to filter out non-serious people, that come to get the bonuses in order to sell them and dump the token`s price.In Total you get 250 + 100 + 500 = 850 TokensPlus The Team is issuing Smartex Exchange SUSD stable coin and you will also get Amount of Purchased Tokens X 0,1 SUSD on your balance.what do you mean for people who are not serious? can you explain in detail, I'm sure more people will come just for bonuses or airdrops, maybe you make stronger rules as a condition for users who want to join but before that I want to hear more positive feedback

comments.author: tbaroyan
comments.body: The promo action started 3 weeks ago and everyone could get bonus STX tokens (100+500) without investing any money.And it worked till 1-st November. Many people started to cheat the system, signing up with different IPs, using for ID verification fake passports or IDs, just to get those free 600 bonus tokens (100+500).Any project needs real investors too and that`s why the Team decided to add this "Must" condition:Everyone can get 100 Tokens after signing up and 500 more tokens for verification, but they have to buy at least $100 worth 250 tokens in order to unlock 600 bonus tokens and be able to sell/trade them at exchange.I also bought $300 worth 750 tokens ($0.4 currently pre-sale price), taking into consideration, that I can sell trade all my tokens when the pairs trade starts and the starting price will be $0.60 at least. This exchange has big chances to become popular, because it`s 2 in 1. Both Centralized (like Binance, KuCoin etc) and Decentralized (like Pancake, Uniswap)And the token`s price can reach $3.00-$15 in near future.This Exchange Is Absolutely Great, because the Team researched all Top exchanges and will implement the best options.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: i know it's a great exchange , but i'm not sure as you say can reach high prices in the near future , seeing the current achievement is not convincing , and the current market is quite good but sometimes bearish too , what are you pushing so bold in the near future can achieve high prices? do you currently have a lot of real investor users?
